dc:title: Southern Pilgrimage
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Gives an account of Fr. Jerome Drolet and others who are fighting racism and supporting the right to integrate. Describes the violent opposition to their cause and their non-violent counter response. Faces the reader with the reality that everyone is responsible for injustice.
